resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2057</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Using questions sent to an Ask-A-Scientist site, to identify childrens interests in science.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Fragen verwenden geschickt zu einer 
Fragen-Ein-Wissenschaftler Site, um childrens Interessen an der 
Wissenschaft zu kennzeichnen.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En utilisant des questions envoyées à un site 
de Demander-Un-Scientifique, pour identifier des intérêts de 
childrens dans la science.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Usando as perguntas emitidas a um local do 
Pergunt-Um-Cientista, para identificar interesses dos childrens na 
ciência.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Usando le domande trasmesse ad un luogo dello 
Chied-Un-Scienziato, per identificare gli interessi dei childrens 
nella scienza.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρησιμοποιώντας τις ερωτήσεις που στέλνονται σε μια 
περιοχή ρωτώ-α-επιστημόνων, για να προσδιορίσουν childrens τα 
ενδιαφέροντα για την επιστήμη.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Usando las preguntas enviadas a un sitio del 
Pedir-Uno-Cienti'fico, para identificar intereses de los childrens en 
ciencia.</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This article desribes the research into children's scientific interests as measured by the analysis of 1555 science related questions sent to an international Ask_ a-Scientist interet site.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">scientific interests</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">motivation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gender</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieser Artikel desribes, welche die Forschung in 
wissenschaftliche Interessen der Kinder, wie durch die Analyse von 
Wissenschaft 1555 gemessen die Fragen in Verbindung stand, die zu 
einem internationalen geschickt wurden, bitten _ um um 
EinWissenschaftler interet Site.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les desribes de cet article que la recherche sur les 
intérêts scientifiques des enfants comme mesurés par l'analyse de 
la science 1555 a fait un rapport entre des questions envoyées et un 
international demandent _ le site d'interet d'un-Scientifique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os desribes que deste artigo a pesquisa em interesses 
científicos das crianças como medidos pela análise da ciência 1555
relacionou as perguntas emitidas a um internacional pedem _ o local do
interet do um-Cientista.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Desribes che di questo articolo la ricerca sugli interessi
scientifici dei bambini come misurati dall'analisi della scienza 1555 
ha collegato le domande trasmesse ad un internazionale chiedono _ il 
luogo del interet dello un-Scienziato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το άρθρο desribes η έρευνα στα επιστημονικά 
ενδιαφέροντα των παιδιών όπως μετριούνται από την ανάλυση 
1555 σχετικών με την επιστήμη ερωτήσεων που στέλνονται σε έναν
διεθνή ρωτά τη _ περιοχή α-επιστημόνων interet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los desribes de este artículo que la investigación en 
los intereses científicos de los niños según lo medido por el 
análisis de la ciencia 1555 relacionó las preguntas enviadas a un 
internacional piden _ el sitio del interet del uno-Cienti'fico.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">wissenschaftliche Interessen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beweggrund</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschlecht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">intérêts scientifiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">motivation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">genre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">interesses científicos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">motivation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gender</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">interessi scientifici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">motivazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">genere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">επιστημονικά ενδιαφέροντα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κίνητρο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γένος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">intereses científicos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">motivación</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">género</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
